description: I've been working as a backend developer at MDT Solutions, contributing to high-quality and scalable Django-based systems.My work focuses on API design, database optimization, and real-time application logic. I've actively collaborated on multiple key products including:

projects.name: PriorCash
projects.detail: Restaurants and small food businesses required a centralized digital POS system to manage orders, billing, and store operations efficiently. Developed a scalable Django-based backend with RESTful APIs for order processing, store management, and real-time order updates.

projects.name: Clap&Go
projects.detail:
Business owners needed a SaaS-style POS platform where they could create and manage their own
stores and handle online food order.
Implemented a multi-tenant Django architecture allowing each client to manage their store
independently with authentication and order management APIs.

projects.name: NowInfluencer
projects.detail:
Aspiring influencers lacked a centralized platform to build verified digital profiles, showcase achievements, manage social presence, and track engagement across platforms.
Developed a Django-based backend system enabling users to create influencer profiles, manage digital badges, track fitness and social metrics, and integrate multiple social media channels.

projects.name: EventCombo
projects.detail:
Event organizers needed a centralized platform to manage event registration, ticketing, speaker management, badge generation, and scheduling without relying on multiple disconnected tools.
Built a comprehensive Django-based event management system with modules for ticket booking, speaker onboarding, automated badge generation, event scheduling, and party management.

location: Nayab Park, Salamatpura, Sharif Garden, Lahore
description: I‚Äôve served as an internship backend developer at ProjectZ, contributing to automation-focused and scalable Django-based systems. My work included API development, database optimization, and AIoT-based product systems.

projects.name: HomeSifu
projects.detail:
Traditional rental platforms lacked smart automation features such as digital lock access, fingerprint authentication, and AIoT-based security monitoring, resulting in limited security and manual property management.
Developed a Django-powered rental management system integrated with AIoT components including smart lock cards, fingerprint authentication, and automated access control.
